annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's all for today as the game is over.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.

Dries Mertens (Napoli) latches onto a cross into the box from the wing and gets in a header. It went well towards the goal, but it was blocked by one of the defenders. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Napoli.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 3 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Close effort! Dries Mertens (Napoli) takes the resulting free kick from a promising distance, but he sends it narrowly wide of the right post.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The game is interrupted. Alfred Duncan (Sassuolo) is given a yellow card. He has to be more careful now.
Alfred Duncan (Sassuolo) brings his opponent down. Antonio Damato has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul. Napoli earn a free kick which could lead to a goal scoring opportunity.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It will be a substitution. Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) is ready to enter the pitch as Ivan Strinic walks off.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli) is quickest to react to the rebound and stabs the ball into the back of the net. It's 2:2.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jose Callejon (Napoli) will deliver the ball into the penalty box from a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee awards a corner and Stefano Sensi (Sassuolo) goes over to take it.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Maurizio Sarri prepares a substitution. Jorginho is replaced by Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's a goal! Luca Mazzitelli (Sassuolo) scores with a brilliant low shot into the middle of the goal after being released inside the box by a superb lofted pass from Antonino Ragusa. The score is now 2:1.
Federico Ricci (Sassuolo) takes a direct free kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) receives a yellow card from the referee, but it seems like a very harsh decision.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee allows time for a substitution. Domenico Berardi will be replaced by Federico Ricci (Sassuolo).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Stefano Sensi (Sassuolo) is cautioned and receives a yellow card.
Andrea Consigli (Sassuolo) takes the ball and sets it for the free kick.
OFF THE POST! Good play from Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) as skips past two defending players and from the edge of the box unleashes a decent strike that smashes the right post!
Antonino Ragusa (Sassuolo) is caught offside!

Luca Mazzitelli (Sassuolo) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Antonio Damato blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion.
That's a well taken pass by Piotr Zielinski (Napoli). He unleashes a strike from the edge of the box, but blazes it high over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Allan trots off the pitch and is replaced by Piotr Zielinski (Napoli).
Dries Mertens (Napoli) tries to beat the goalkeeper from a set piece from some 21 metres out. He's very close, but his effort only bounces off the crossbar!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Luca Mazzitelli (Sassuolo) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! The ball breaks to Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) after some poor defending, he finds himself one on one with the goalkeeper and calmly puts the ball into the back of the net! He makes it 1:1.
Stefano Sensi (Sassuolo) is going to send the ball in from the free kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's a goal! Dries Mertens (Napoli) gets on the end of a pass and it allows him to finish into an empty net with a close range header. The score has changed to 0:1.
Antonio Damato blows his whistle as Antonino Ragusa (Sassuolo) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Eusebio Di Francesco has decided to make a substitution during the half time break. Alessandro Matri (Sassuolo) comes on the pitch for Gregoire Defrel.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Half time substitution. Eusebio Di Francesco decided to make a change. Lorenzo Pellegrini is replaced by Luca Mazzitelli (Sassuolo).

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Antonio Damato has ended it.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Corner kick. Ivan Strinic (Napoli) is ready to send the ball into the box.
Allan (Napoli) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety. Napoli force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 1 min. of added time.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) looks like he will be the one to try and deliver a quality ball into the penalty box from the corner kick.
A precise low pass is received by Gregoire Defrel (Sassuolo), who makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box, but his poorly placed shot sails well over the bar.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) is flagged for offside.
Lorenzo Pellegrini (Sassuolo) latches on to a pass on the edge of the box, but he can't get any power into the shot and fails to trouble Pepe Reina.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) will deliver the corner kick.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) picks up a pass and unleashes a low shot towards goal, but he can't generate enough power to trouble Andrea Consigli.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) shoots after receiving a good pass. His effort from the edge of the box goes just wide of the left post.

Marek Hamsik (Napoli) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went low towards the middle of the target, but Andrea Consigli was alert and the score remained the same.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) receives a brilliant pass and wastes a big opportunity as his shot from inside the penalty area flies narrowly wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
Alfred Duncan (Sassuolo) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Alfred Duncan (Sassuolo) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.
Allan (Napoli) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked. The ball goes out of play. Napoli are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) works the corner short.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) produces a dangerous lofted cross into the box which is intercepted. The ball is out of play. Napoli win a corner kick.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) will take the free kick.

An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli). Antonio Damato saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul. Sassuolo win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Strinic (Napoli) will take the corner.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) takes a direct free kick.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
Napoli will kick off.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Antonio Damato.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Before the start of the game, you can see the starting lineups for today's clash.
Hello, welcome to our live play by play commentaries. You will be able to see a written form of all the interesting moments of the game, so you won't miss a thing. Sit back and have fun.
Dries Mertens has already scored 21 goals and he is the top goal scorer for Napoli in the competition.
Sassuolo have to be stronger going forward as they have already lost 9 home matches.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's all for today as the game is over.
